name: Anxiety Treatment with Relaxation
description: Dr. Lora Heugens talks about anxiety, how to calm down and feel good about yourself. She talks about common scenarios that normally makes people anxious and goes into details to react to them. She describes the process that will enable you to calm yourself quickly and efficiently anytime.

name: 100 Hidden Fish
description: The fish hid. Try to find them all! A very large location.

name: Follow the Black Kitten
description: You buy a laptop with your hands. You find an interactive collection of short stories on your laptop and something else. Or someone? What will all this lead to?

name: Alchemist of War
description: Alchemist of War is a casual card game with crafting elements. Play as the alchemist merchant. Craft weapons using random ingredients. Your customers are from both sides of a war. But you don't have any favorites! As long as they keep paying. And if the fight goes on longer, maybe you can sell more.

name: Psychic
description: You are a psychic named Marilyn.The police contacted you to help find the missing girl.You are the only one who can help them.

name: Chilli Con Valley
description: Chilli con Valley! Help the Bean reach its chilli con Carne pot as fast as possible. Jump over Obstacles and dangerous objects just like lava and knives. Who doesn't want to help a poor little bean? Chilli con valley is a game for people with a lot of persistence and a mentally strong head.

name: One Way
description: One Way is a 3D platformer with various puzzles, traps and obstacles.

name: Colony Simulator
description: Can your Colony survive 10 days or more in the desert? Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies!

name: The Immaculate Drag
description: A small game about letting go. Stay up late. Smoke cigarettes. Talk to strangers. Think about what you've lost. Someone you used to love? Or someone you used to be?

name: Nevedomo
description: Nevedomo is a dynamic arena first-person shooter with a Zetlex robot. Future. Two warring factions Rockets and Bullets participate in deadly competitions under the leadership of the Texer Force Corporation in order to capture the world's resources. Have a good fight!

name: Dog Adventure
description: Dog Adventure is an incredibly challenging side-scrolling game. If you like challenging platformers, then this game is definitely for you. In this game you play as a funny dog ​​that needs to get into its house. Complete all the hardest levels of this game with funny music!

name: Back and Back to Hell
description: BACK and BACK to Hell is a Top Down shooter in which you will have to fight waves of demons that endlessly make their raids on the main character, hoping to finish an absolutely crushing preemptive strike on their ranks.

name: Ibatic
description: Ibatic is a fast-paced platformer in which you evolve in a fantastic world. Beat the fastest time in each level by sliding, jumping and dashing through various deadly environments using the power of your staff.

name: Bomb Sweeper VR
description: Don't get stuck in your old minesweeper style games with just a basic grid. Challenge yourself on a virtual reality version set on a variety of islands in all shapes and sizes.

name: Race! Beauty! Bugs!
description: In "Race! Beauty! Bugs!" you have to pave the way through the godforsaken places of the world. At your disposal will be machines of all classes that only man created.

name: Goat's Tale Plus
description: The treasures hidden on the tops of the four lands await the most lively goat daredevils. The challenge will be difficult and… irritating - only the best and most patient will get to the top.

name: Pocket Rocket
description: Pocket Rocket is a minimalistic arcade racing game where you try to get the fastest time possible by maneuvering through tough hand-crafted levels.

name: Innocent Passage
description: Use real-world shipping data to visualise a future maritime conflict.

name: Cat Town
description: Become a leader who leads the cat herd, build your base, upgrade your buildings, resist bad weather, cultivate better offspring, resist the plunder of wild animals, lie down and roll the cat in a relaxed atmosphere, or become a person to enjoy the scenery

name: Vaccine Delivery Adventure
description: Vaccine Delivery Adventure is a classic side-scrolling action game where a healthcare worker has to overcome the challenges of delivering the BCG Vaccine to the communities that need it!

name: Polygon Hunter VR
description: Polygon Hunter VR is a fast paced shooter in which a child falls asleep in geometry class and in his dream faces polygonal figures at cute scenarios inspired by different countries of the world, to achieve his goal he must clear level after level, will you help Eddie?

name: Goat's Tale
description: Get ready for an amazing, challenging goat adventure where only the best can get to the top.

name: Slime Crown
description: Slime Crown is a colorful pixel art game with a unique but challenging gameplay. The colors green, blue, red and yellow are the key to success.

name: McSpace Colosseum
description: McSpace Colosseum is a dungeon crawler fully packed with action and roguelite elements. Discover all kind of worlds, collect crazy gadgets &relics, and face blood-lusting bosses with up to 4 friends. Will you rise as the strongest gladiator in this whacky and limitless reality show?

name: Skator Gator
description: Skator Gator is a lane-based 2D platformer starring a gator fighting back against a corporation that's polluted his home and the surrounding areas.

name: Kovox Pitch
description: Kovox Pitch is a rhythm-baseball game that has some depth. It comes with a wholesome story and memorable post-punk music. The aim of the game is to swap between two lines in order to successfully hit balls with a baseball bat and experience that 2.5D effect. It has Story mode with story-related events and challenges, and Free Play mode to simply enjoy the game.

name: Mandela Invasion
description: FNAF like game inspired by Mandela Catalogue

name: XIX
description:
A free adult game based on "Teen Titans (2003)". Game set on alternate timeline Where Terra joined Titans instead of Slade. Game begins after Titans defeated Brotherhood of Evil in the show.

You play as a new Titan trainee, who wants to prove himself and become a better titan. On your way towards the goal you develop friendship with 6 Titan girls.
You can either turn the friendship into Relationship or Become a friend with benefits. It's your choice.

name: Binky XXIV: Game Streamer "Binky" Plays Grotto of the Grebulons
description: Sin descripción

name: Gotoubun: RE
description: Fangame from the acclaimed manga and anime series The Quintessential Quintuplets.

name: Wikitrivia
description: Wikitrivia is a trivia browser game created by Tom J. Watson, which gained popularity in January 2022. Players are presented with a timeline and a card with a subject and a type of date, and must put the event in the correct place in the timeline.

name: Rum no Izumi Dungeon
description: An adventure, strategy RPG where you have to reach the sealed girl Ram in order to save the world!

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 5C
description: Sin descripción

name: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter
description: The Argonauts Agency – Find out how the family turmoil of the gods has affected common mortals and how it all ends!

name: Avocado Love
description: Avocado Love is a colorful and enjoyable platformer with a side view. Pirates have kidnapped the soul mate of our hero Avocado, help him save her and reunite again.

name: Miss Agatha's Palace
description: Save the princesses, save the world! The legendary girls of Miss Agatha's Palace have been abducted. It's up to you and your friends to rescue them and stop global destruction. Make big choices and wind up with the woman of your dreams, plus a few others on the side.

name: Spellcaster
description: Spellcaster is a top-down, shoot 'em up, tower defence action game. You control an old wizard who has to defend his home from hordes of monsters. Powerful spells and bullets will help you in this task. A warm, atmospheric fantasy game.

name: Mage Tower
description: Forge your own adventure in Mage Tower! Explore the land of Aikala, embark on an epic adventure in this strategy action game.

name: Golden Mine Pickaxe
description: You are a brave digger who went in search of minerals! Alone, you have to find as many of them as possible and improve your outfit in order to move further and further each time.

name: Drop one NPC to another
description: This is a 2D ACT Game, and a fitness game. your target is use yourself to collide or drag one NPC to let it collide to another NPC, and it also has leisure time to let you follow our character to play jump rope or boxing and so on to fit your body.

name: Thumb-Thump
description: TT is for your THUMBS When a scene begins, a song will be played. If YOU can match the right keys at the right moment, your SKILL improves and the flowers turn green.

name: Aurora: El Destino de los Mundos
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw Novel: Kinky Bondage
description: Lara and Jane discover a kinky bondage device and decide to try it out. Solve all 12 jigsaw puzzles to find out what naughty things Jane and Lara have done.

name: Streaming Girls 18+:- OnlyFap Live
description: Date them all, win the girls over and unlock unique sex scenes! Streaming Girls 18+ is a classic puzzle game with visual novel mechanics and beautiful sexy scenes.

name: Kyouai Renka
description:
The usual morning begins.
A room in an apartment without a sense of life.
A light breakfast is served on the table.
Coffee and then scrambled eggs on bread.
A comfortable and luxurious life.
A life that is too luxurious for me.

――My life is falling.
I'm dominated by you and I can't do anything about it.

name: Alleyway DX
description: A big overhaul of Alleyway for the Game Boy. Adding colors, fixes and improvements.

name: Truco!: Chapter 1
description: Truco!: Chapter 1 is the first chapter of the game Truco!

name: Pokémon Kanto Ultimate
description: A challenging and revised Kanto, with an extended story, harder difficulty, all legendaries obtainable. 386 Pokemon, every hero, gym leader, and popular characters from the first three generations (including the anime) all making an appearance.

name: Idle Calibur
description: A Pixel Rogue + Real Time War + Idle Play + Open World + RPG strategy cute Anime game.

name: What I Heard
description:
You are a Lady’s maid to Lady Catherine Holloway, the daughter of a wealthy and locally prominent family in the village of Thrumshire.

Lady Elizabeth Holloway, Catherine’s mother, has been taken ill, much to the suspicion of Lady Catherine. You are asked to a private meeting where she tells you of her suspicions, she believes her mother is being poisoned by someone in the house.

You are to interrogate the staff, listen to household conversations and find clues, you have 3 days to find out as much as you can, then you must accuse someone of the crime.

name: Doggo Dentist
description:
Welcome to Yarrow. You are our newest Doggo Dentist! During your totally rad career and stay with us, you will meet so many gnarly furry friends, promote your professional career and figure out what makes Yarrow the leading market competitor. So what are you waiting for? Lets begin!

Doggo Dentist is my newest free and short indie point-and click game made in six weeks, on the engine Clickteam fusion. This is the beta version- so it may be buggy!

Doggo Dentist is an awesome and totally tubular, 80's inspired point and click management game, that you should like most definitely give a try. Play as a newly hired dentist who must figure out how to perform his job in a not so radical dental firm called Yarrow. Manage cleanings, extractions, veterinary services and many more tasks on 3 unique canines, as you take the advice and heated conversation from another fellow employee named Chanice. All in all, you must figure out what to make of your new career and decide if Yarrow is the right fit for you!

name: Cut
description: "Cut" is a story about the self, the protagonist will explore in a dark and dreamy world, cutting the plant that brings pain to this world - Ner.

name: Futbol Break: Head to Head
description: Futbol Break: Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Futbol themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Tumbledown Drive
description:
Drive, jump and honk your way to the top of this exceedingly punishing platformer.
Be careful, it's a long, long way down if you fall.
Includes controller support, a speedrun timer, regular secrets and secrets.

name: My Sweet Zombie!
description: When you crave cookies instead of brains.

name: SuchInheritance
description: As for unknown treasures, people always hold the idea that the seer has a share, but they don't know that some treasures may be easy to see, but they have to risk their lives to take them.

name: Child vs. Clowns
description: Child vs Clowns - Top Down View with elements of the Bomberman game.

name: Galactic Ravager
description: The planet earth was attacked by aliens. Only you, the captain of the aerospace forces, can save the planet from enemies. You have to protect the orbital station, as well as penetrate behind enemy lines and destroy all the aliens.

name: Remembrance
description: A story-driven experience about a painter who lost her memory and wants to get it back... or at least, she thinks she does.

name: Nervous Granny
description: Nervous Granny is a 2d platformer in which we control Granny, who, with the help of her cane, deals with evil robbers who are encroaching on her rest and purse, jump on platforms, collect bonuses and use them to buy various improvements for further progress.

name: Bo's Adventure: Merging Islands
description: An 8-bit Casual Story game The 1st game of Bo's Adventure Franchise.

name: Dave Dave Dave
description: Dave Dave Dave, is a retro style hardcore platforming game set in an unknown world for you to explore with a single goal, reaching freedom.

name: Stowaway
description: Stowaway is a pixel style horror shooting game.

name: Dr4x
description: A fast paced dark fantasy turn based strategy game with horror elements In a world with many secrets to uncover... The game has simple, fun, fast paced gameplay full of tough choices where each of the many factions plays wildly differently and the world evolves and changes as you play.

name: The Last Ones Left
description: "The LastOnesLeft" is a first-person survival horror game where the player finds themselves in an abandoned village overrun by zombies. Uncover the truth about what happened by finding mysterious letters from an unknown source.

name: Sonia and the Hypnotic City
description: After receiving reports of a group of criminals using some sort of power to rob an entire city, the church dispatches a Holy Knight named Sonia to investigate the incident.

name: MessiahEnd Refrain
description: This is an action game where a cute girl explores the stage!

name: Skull's Impossible Quest
description: Skull’s Impossible Quest is a physics-based hack-and-slash story. Swinging the players weapon using the mouse will build up velocity which translates to damage. The game also contains dialog trees, ragdoll physics, and collectables.

name: RagnaTales MMORPG
description: RagnaTales is a community-driven MMORPG that brings the classic experience of old-mmos to life with modern updates and new gameplay features. Players can explore vibrant landscapes, engage in epic battles, and experience nostalgic adventures, all while participating in dynamic group activities and large-scale events. With customized quests, unique server events, and balanced classes, RagnaTales offers both seasoned players and newcomers a refreshing take on their amazing universe!

name: Voyager
description: Grab your backpack, it's time to travel around the world! Visit landmarks, monuments and attractions in famous cities. Apply for a variety of jobs. Then, bring your luggage and fly off into the unknown once again!

name: Astonishing Baseball 22
description: Astonishing Baseball (or AB for friends) is not your usual baseball simulation game. It's not only about tables full of players and stats. It's about people! Well okay, you heard that line from your Economics 101 class already. But I promise, this game will be way more interesting! It's like a narrative roguelike sports game, Seriously!

name: Dog Wash!
description: Give the doggo a bubble bath and a shower with the shampoo and water shower head in the bath! Dry the doggo and remove any loose fur and under coat with the blow dryer in the groom station! Release the doggo outside and you're done!

name: MonsterReaver
description: MonsterReaver is a multiplayer game where you place stones to take your opponents stones.

name: Cryptid Coffeehouse
description: everyone's heard of mothman– the moth creature that haunts the outskirts of point pleasant, west virginia– but no one's heard of it like this! in some random idyllic midwestern town, you meet artemis (aka mothman) at your favorite coffee shop and begin an agonizingly slow burn romance with them.

name: Pleasure Party
description:
In this "Sandbox" style erotic game, you can choose from 12 diverse locations for your sex party, select from 15 different characters to invite, and place your characters into any of 24 different sexual positions including solo, standard, lesbian and anal.

Be creative as you create sex parties at a nudist resort, a night club, a quiet beach, a public block party and more.

name: The Ambassador's Coterie
description: Slow-burn kinetic short story about two Ambassadors of differing stations, empires, and species reclaiming their common ground -- and other common 'areas'.

name: Airport CEO: Beasts of the East
description: Revive the beasts of the east with these four eastern aircraft!

name: Touhou Monster TD: Nagae Iku
description: Add a usable character Nagae Iku into the game.

name: Doomori: Eternal
description: Prepare to rip, tear and slaughter everyone in your way through the sequel to the critically acclaimed Doomori. Featuring a full OST, beautiful art, and fast-paced, Doom inspired gameplay, Doomori: Eternal is a funny and challenging experience.

name: The Office: Somehow We Manage
description: The Office: Somehow We Manage lets fans play through hilarious moments from the critically-acclaimed Emmy award winning comedy, where they'll tap their way to record proﬁts at Dunder Mifflin, and get down to business with Michael Scott, Jim Halpert, Pam Beesly, Kelly Kapoor, Dwight Schrute, Stanley Hudson and others.

name: Pirate Treasure: Island of Mazes
description: The game has motion control, so you have to use your console's gyroscope in order to try and solve the puzzles. There are a plethora of puzzles to choose from, so you will end up having a whole bunch of fun all the time. Since there are dozens of levels to choose from, you always get to enjoy a unique and immersive game experience. Plus, you can test your puzzle solving skills and improve them as you go along. Check it out for yourself today! Features: - Motion controlled puzzles - Dozens of levels to play through - Beautiful pirate theme - Engaging, fun gameplay - Lots of replay value

name: AirRevo
description: Climb into the cockpit and pilot your red stunt plane as far and as fast as you can over a landscape of mountains, lakes, the big city, a bustling international airport, and more! Collect silver and gold stars along the way to earn points and make it up the tournament scoreboard, but be warned, the competition is tough. Don’t run out of fuel or crash too many times as you’ll be out of the competition – and don’t run out of time either! Also try completing the many achievements set in the tournament, including barrel rolling, trick flying, and even causing water and snow sprays! So strap yourself in and get ready for a fast, exciting, and fun flight into the wide blue yonder.

name: Frigore
description: Frigore is a simple classic first-person indie survival horror game, made entirely by one person. Simple gameplay, beautiful graphics and a cold and chilling atmosphere.

name: Isekai Succubus: My Genderbent Saga in Another World
description: An isekai 3D dungeon crawler RPG following the story of a genderbent protagonist and cute succubus girls! After awakening in an unfamiliar world, the protagonist finds that he has changed genders and become a succubus. Will he be able to overcome the hardships and return to his original world?

name: Anchor Club
description: Anchor is a form of creative writing of textual interaction of origin, using the function of dice, in which a random number of prepared options determine the development of the story (the dice have a will of their own).

name: Jingor Mine
description: Rule: In the jingor face, click the left mouse button to open the grid in sweeper mode, and to mark mines when switching to mine marking mode. Of particular interest is the mines on the other side of an edge in the jingor face.

name: Polygunners
description: Polygunners is a cross between a twin-stick shooter and an RPG. Upgrade abilities, explore dungeons and towns, and fight bosses to progress through the world. Playing with your friends with local co-op cranks the experience up to 11 for satisfying dynamic gameplay.

name: Archipelago
description: Archipelago is a roguelike tower defense game about defending randomly generated islands. Setup your defenses, manage your income, and find powerful charms to repel the enemy. Archipelago introduces tension and strategy to the tower defense genre.

name: It follows you
description: You are all alone in this dark and frightening place. Run and hide, hurry to find a way out, because it follows you...

name: Circo: Dark Story
description: Circo:Dark Story is a pixel action RPG game.Your goal - discover your past in the Kingdom Ruins and defeat the Emperor of Darkness!

name: Last Sinner
description: Last Sinner is a Top Down Shooter with elements of a Royal Battle.

name: Em
description: EM is a fast-paced, hard hitting 3D fighter featuring Electro-Magnetic combat. To win the war against the machines, you as an elite fighter will go fist to fist on a mission to annihilate them all!

name: Electric
description: Feel like an electrician in a fun logic puzzle game with a view from above - the Electric game.

name: Sex Dating Trip
description: You want to have sex with every woman you meet? That doesn't have to be a dream!In this game you go on an sex dating trip!In the beginning you meet your girlfriend for a casual date, but it turns into a sex date. After that, you can find another girlfriend to sex date right away!

name: Kyo: Gigantify
description: You Grow Big, and Create Your Path to the Exit! That's It. This a a short game by the way.

name: Snowyland
description: Snowyland is a pixel art platformer where the player must eat to survive on an empty, barren island. You should freeze family members to create ice platforms that help you reach your dinner. Choose where this ice platforms are placed, and create solutions that even the developers have not seen yet!

name: Bomb! Bomb! Carnival!!
description: Third-person sports bombing, where you compete with other players using a variety of bombs.

name: Two World Portal
description: Travel to a mysterious world and solve the series of puzzles to activate the ancient portal.

name: Thirty Eternal Days
description: Touch the world after the Catastrophe. Remember your life, which has become almost endless. Repent of your past and try to save the future in this sci-fi text-based interactive adventure game.

name: Mahou Shoujo Desu ga, Dungeon de Mugen ni Tsuyoku Natte mo Ii Desu ka
description: レトロゲーム風ダンジョン探索J-RPG！✨魔法を選んで敵を攻撃するフル音声ターン制バトル！✨フルボイスのストーリー✨無量大数を超えて強くなる魔法少女えりかの冒険！✨強大な敵を倒してダンジョンの深層まで辿り着けるか✨

name: How Fish Is Made
description: Are sardines trustworthy? Are you? Do you want to be? How Fish is Made is a janky little jaunt through the world of surrealist storytelling.

name: Bitch Government
description: A princess who abusing her body for diplomacy. But she is getting accustom to sexual excitement, and her important part and thought are getting bad.

name: Bok
description: BOK is a 2D Indie-Platformer with a cartoony and fun aesthetic, that may possibly be overrun with difficulty and rage. It may prove to be quite the adventure, with many struggles and broken monitors along the way, so have fun with the game while you still have the chance. Good Luck!

name: Wild West
description: WILD WEST - is a hardcore 3D shooter with survival elements where you will have to fight various enemies playing as a sheriff James.

name: Coloring Pixels: Isometric 2
description: This Isometric 2 themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The second book of it's kind offers various images and scenes all designed in the isometric perspective!Isometric is back by popular demand!

name: Moon Dancer
description: Moon Dancer is a vertically scrolling shmup featuring an exhilarating lock-on laser.

name: Where's My Horse? An Escape the Room Adventure
description: Experience an at-home Escape Room adventure! Find secrets, solve puzzles, and open locked chests to help you solve the mystery- where did your horse go?

name: Ragnar
description: Inspired by old NES games, Ragnar is a 2D run-and-gun action platformer that will be difficulty and fair. We would like to bring back the classic and retro feel to modern platforms and a new generation of gamers.

name: Project Myriad 2
description: Project Myriad 2 is a tower defense strategy game. Build towers on a grid of hexagons floating in space. 35 levels with unique tiles and mechanics each providing a unique challenge. 3 difficulty levels including extreme mode which has never ending waves of enemies. Strive for your new high score!

name: Funny Pets
description: In this cute Match-3 game a terrible tornado carried away all the funny pets! Help them to find the way to their small town Petsville

name: It's on You
description: It's On You is an FMV game in which your choices will affect the outcome of Curtis and those around him. The latter caught between a world of crime and violence, in the wake of a gang taking control of the community and a potential career as an international footballer.

name: Kansei: The Second Turn HD
description: A teenager with the ability to relive the death of any corpse he touches finds himself tangled in another murder case when the owner of a high profile corporation dies under mysterious circumstances. This time, however, he's forced to team up with a group of kids with abilities as strange as his own. Unfortunately, these new teammates might be more dangerous than the killer they're hunting. Everyone has something to hide, and the past never stays hidden for long. Interrogate suspects, explore the house of the wealthy deceased, and unearth the secrets of others while you try to keep your own hidden.

name: Set 'N Det
description: Solve puzzles with explosions! Casual 2D puzzle game with 72 levels/puzzles to solve.

name: Box's Dream
description: Box's Dream is an elegant puzzle game in which you'll have to push boxes to the correct positions, but it won't be easy, as various challenges such as ice floors, holes, pistons and many others await you in this exciting and unforgettable experience.

name: Vektor Z
description: Vektor Z brings fast and furious retro space blasting action to Steam! Blast your way through endless waves of asteroids and enemies to write your name among the stars! Vektor Z offers both relentless action and vibrant visuals that is certain to have you playing again and again!

name: LUL inc.
description: LUL Inc. is a collection of over 30 different micro-games that will test your skills in a variety of genres. Can you beat them all and defeat the evil machine?

name: Go Fetch!
description: Video Chat Party Game for 3+ Players of All Ages. Players take turns being the judge and giving out prompts for other players to use in finding a real-life object. Points are awarded not just for getting items that match the prompt quickly, but also for matching the prompt in a creative way.

name: HiddenFrog
description: Scale the tower and get back home as fast as you can!

name: Crystal Clash
description: Crystal Clash is a hybrid of MOBA, tower defense and deckbuilding - with fast-paced, easy-to-pickup tug-of-war strategy. Play 2v2 or co-op with a friend, or pair up with new allies and enemies for action-packed battles! Collect cards, build your decks and have fun crushing your enemies!

name: Mental Hospital: Child of Evil
description: Mental Hospital is a truly scary first-person stealth horror game. Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this atmospheric horror game.

name: Astonishing Baseball Manager 21
description: Build your dream lineup, manage a baseball team, sign contracts and live the exciting life of a baseball manager!

name: Supraland: Six Inches Under
description: Supraland Six Inches Under has exploration, puzzles, and combat! A first-person-metroidvania taking place six inches under Supraland.

name: Asteroid Five
description: Asteroid Five is a first person space exploration game where you investigate the inner caves of an asteroid passing by your planet. Aboard your ship, dive into the deeps of the asteroid, collecting information and samples of the many beautiful minerals and lifeforms who call this place home. Perhaps, somewhere you can even discover remains of an ancient intelligent species long forgotten.

name: Anderson
description: Anderson is a story-driven VR game inspired by classic point & click adventures. Experience a world of science and mystery, with the assistance of a peculiar simulated personality.

name: Reloader: test_subject
description:
Reloader: test_subject is an experimental "Bullet Counting Reload Action" game that features realistic gun control combined with movie-style cinematics. We were inspired by numerous classic shootouts from movies and the indie game called Receiver.
Experience being a Reloader: having legendary shooting skills and engaging in Close-Quarters Combat. You just have to remember how to use the gun you're holding.

name: New Home: Medieval Village
description: New Home: Medieval Village is a city building and management game. Build roads, zone house, trade and farming lands, and attract people to your village. Meet your villagers needs, educate them and zone more lands considering demands. Attract whealtier people and grow your village over time.

name: Paper Glider
description: Paper Glider is a construction-paper-styled game in which you control a gliding paper triangle through a series of 70 unique and colorful levels. The controls are simple to understand but difficult to master, leading to a challenging and rewarding gameplay experience. Learn to master your momentum to complete all 7 worlds!

name: Operation Zeta
description: Operation Zeta is a space action game. The great battle codenamed 'Operation Zeta' has been lost. Your ship is in shambles and you have to act quickly to collect all of the parts and repair your ship before the warzone is completely destroyed by the enemy's death laser. Play and unlock 13 playable characters from space monkeys to mischievous slugs each with their own unique set of skills and challenges. As well unlock new abilities and upgrades with credits you earn during each run. Each time you play the universe is randomly generated with random quests from wacky local aliens who have stolen the parts of your ship. All in a physics based battlefield, but beware as you only have ten minutes until the death laser fires!

name: Wren
description: Walk, Run, and Ride on your world to save theirs. WREN is an online health and fitness RPG. Harness the power of the mysterious Mana Well to stop The Ancient One from destroying all traces of the world and setting it back to its primal existence.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - The Return of Ryunosuke Naruhodo
description:
Phoenix Wright has just returned to England after an exhausting adventure in the town of Labyrinthia and is ready to relax for the rest of his stay. However, he soon gets involved in a string of mysteries that lead to him reviving a great ace attorney who disappeared a hundred years ago.

Follow defence attorneys Phoenix Wright and Ryunosuke Naruhodo as they fight for their clients' lives in the Crown Court of London while seeking the truth behind the rampage of the Doctor from a hundred year's past!

name: Milk Bottle and Monster Girl
description: Sin descripción

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Silverwing: Beyond
description:
Version 5.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the "Thus Spoke Apocalypse" arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Silverwing: N-EX
• New Open World: A Post Honkai Odyssey Chapter 2
• New Story Chapter XXVIII: Beyond Will
• New Animated Short: Thus Spoke Apocalypse
• ...and more!

name: Busty Bunny the Bounty Babe
description:
You are Busty, a buxom bunny bounty babe, looking to nab the ultimate score, a gang boss named Fanny Fennec, leader of the Fanny Pack. You land your 57 star cruiser spacecraft on the outskirts of Delta city on the planet 6-9. instantly you can see evidence of the gang. Propaganda posters litter the streets, urging people to join the pack or submit to it. Then you see them. Fennecs start to emerge from the dark, trash-filled alleyways. They glare at you menacingly. They know who you are and why you are here, and they are not going to go easy on you. Get ready for the fight of your life!

Survive the onslaught of enemies and get to the goal sign at the end of each level! pick up Bimbo-Cola to refill your health! 18 levels spread across 6 unique zones, with 3 amazing boss battles!

name: Techblast
description:
Techblast is a 2 map wad for Boom compatible ports (tested in GZDoom, Prboom, DSDA Doom and Doom Retro) featuring classic styled techbases and some difficult encounters.

MAP01 starts things off with a slower paced exploratory level, then MAP02 escalates into harder encounters. Difficulty levels are supported, and I recommend HMP for the first time through unless you're a very confident player. Freelook is fine, jumping is not. It can be played continuously or with pistol starts.

name: Today I Went on a Quest
description: A curse has fallen on Magi Burger! Three employees decide to head into the store on a day they're not scheduled to save their coworkers from the evil that has struck them.

name: Heroes of Mythic Might
description: Heroes of Mythic Might is an Idle RPG card game. It will transport you into a fantasy adventure world based on Eastern myths and legends.

name: Occula
description: Maps vary in length and complexity, with some harder fights being optional. 3 secret maps full of BS and nonsense for those who like being abused by videogames.

name: G-Mode Archives 40: Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha
description:
"Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha" is a Japanese-style fantasy RPG that depicts a magnificent story woven by gods and humans on the stage of "The Land of the Sun".

The "God Drop" system, which allows you to use unique secret techniques by possessing the gods yourself, and the "Gogyo Aisei and Soko" system, which changes damage depending on the attributes of the gods and the attributes of enemies, etc., produce strategic battles.

There are also plenty of collection elements such as completing the picture book by meeting monsters and gods, and there are also dungeons that appear only under specific conditions.

In order to stop my brother who fell into darkness, make a contract with the eight million gods in various places and defeat the darkness with the ultimate secret technique!

name: Chubby Pixel Mega Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Tall Man Run
description: Get as tall and wide as you can to take out bots and beat the level!

name: Train Sim World 2: Tharandter Rampe - Dresden: Chemnitz
description: Lean into yesteryear and experience the challenge of the unique tilting DB BR 612 DMU. Power out of Dresden, tackle steep gradients bordered by forest, and drive through the picturesque valleys of Saxony and beyond to Chemnitz with Train Sim World 2: Tharandter Rampe.

name: Unzipping a Mirror
description: A dream vacation.

name: Trogday Micro Game
description: It's Trogdor's 19th Trogday and he's out to smote him a Kerrek. Squish all the peasants while avoiding the knights to achieve burnination. Then burninate all the cottages to face off against the Kerrek himself.

name: My Hayami-Chan
description: A tamagotchi-like game about having your own Anime girl.

name: World of Warships: Aurora Steam Edition
description: Besides the equal-parts beautiful and historic Soviet Tier III Premium cruiser Aurora, this exclusive deal will set you up with a Port slot, a Commander, 40 equippable signal flags, and 5 Steam camouflages to boot. Don’t wait too long to decide—this bundle will expire on February 14, 2022.

name: Neko to Sakana
description: A top-down, omnidirectional shooting game. Play as a cat and shoot fish to make sushi and power up your ship.

name: Guntech 2
description: Blast aliens and fight dragons in this action-packed retro-style space shooter!

name: Arcade Archives: GunNail
description: GunNail is a shooting game released by NMK in 1993. This game has a feature called the Multiple Shield System where you'll get a higher score the fewer shields you have. Experience hardcore gameplay mechanics typical of NMK, and an intense scoring system!

name: Specwar Tactics
description: Specwar Tactics is a simple game that lets you build up your ideal special operations team and command them in battle. Manage your facilities and troop roster, and lead them on missions, utilizing stealth, fire and maneuver, and CQB to overcome greater numbers with superior tactics.

name: Comixxx Desires
description: Comixxx Desires is a casual game with relaxing atmosphere featuring high quality, hot & sexy girls done in comic book style. Put your logic to the test to solve the puzzle and reveal the girls!

name: Yeolleb Warrior
description: Yeolleb Warrior is a action-adventure game with a cartoon animation style.

name: Aery: Dreamscape
description: In Aery - Dreamscape you play as a bird like spirit who can enter the minds of other people in order to explore their thoughts, their secrets and their imagination. Experience the feeling of flying, immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes and enjoy the unique storytelling of the game... ​

name: Far Cry 6: Deluxe Edition
description:
Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. Become a guerrilla fighter and burn ruthless dictator Antón Castillo's regime to the ground.

The Deluxe Edition includes:
- the base game
- the Ultimate Pack, a compilation featuring three in-game content packs:
- the Jungle Expedition Pack
- the Croc Hunter Pack
- the Vice Pack

name: Final Space: The Rescue
description: The Final Space universe has expanded to VR! Join Gary, Avocato, Nightfall, and Tribore as they embark on a brand new journey to rescue their dear friend from the clutches of a new, but familiar, threat. Take on this shooter adventure solo or online with up to 3 friends! Use your arsenal of weapons to reign supreme and show the galaxy who's boss.

name: Ultra Thunderball
description: Are you ready for the greatest arcade challenge yet? Equip your Gun-Bat and try to defeat the evil geometrics. See you in the tournament!

name: Hot Pickle!
description: Hot Pickle! Is a 2D platform jumping game. Run, jump, shoot, and dash your way through 10 epic food-themed levels.

name: Panzers on the Steppe
description: A fast-paced WWII Eastern Front campaign game that simulates the titanic clashes of armor and armies across the Russian steppe from Finland to the Caucasus mountains. The game does all the logistics so you can focus on strategy and tactics.

name: Secrets of the Past: Mother's Diary
description: Exciting hidden object game with many levels and a thrilling story line. Uncover the Secrets of the Past: Mothers Diary!

name: Keng's Little Universe
description: The game is divided into three parts, which simulate three stages of civilization respectively. The first is the survival of civilization in a multi-stars system. The second is the expansion and war of civilization in a galaxy. The third part is the exploration of god civilization in the universe.

name: Game Battle Tycoon
description: Battle with in-game games! A new kind of game battle!

name: Tor-tor cubes
description: Tor-tor cubes is a puzzle game with a 2D view. The goal of the game is to destroy all the cubes in the level. Many different powerups.

name: Infiltraliens
description: Infiltraliens is an action adventure game in which you take on the role of Gorp. Place 52, the world's most advanced and well-guarded military base is holding your alien friends captive. Can you make your way through the obstacles and pass the guards to save them?

name: RetroDrift: Retrowave Online Road
description: Dive into the atmosphere of the 80's, rushing along the neon roads towards the sunset, letting your supercar drift, enjoying the wonderful tracks in retrowave style.

name: SGS Glory Recalled
description: Relive the Battle of Hong Kong (8–26 December 1941), one of the first battles of the Pacific War in World War II.

name: Card Storm Idle
description: Card Storm Idle is an incremental game with both idle and active play-styles. Research and craft card deсks to earn as many resources as possible! Build up your power and see how far you can get. Bring the card storm down on monsters!

name: Dungeon Masters
description: Dungeon Masters is a skill-based dungeon crawler without any random based gameplay mechanics.The game includes a powerful in-game level editor using which you can create your own dungeons.

name: Xtreme Aces Racing
description: Xtreme Aces Racing brings a new exciting racing genre with combat mechanics and jets! Race through stunning locations around the globe in story mode or challenge a friend in local multiplayer mode. Defeat your enemies using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag.

name: Bash the Teacher!
description: It's time to show the teacher who is the real boss of the classroom in this hilarious clicker game! Click away to blast the teacher with your chosen weapon - watch as the teacher’s frustration grows and discover their funny reactions!

name: Duel Princess
description: This is a side-scrolling tower defense game where you lead your units from your own castle towards the Princess' castle and capture it. There are roguelite elements that lets you enjoy building new decks each time you play the story mode. There are also many sexy rewards that men all over the world can enjoy!

name: Santhai
description: This is a legendary game. come back for everyone to join again The great adventures of the same boy. and so many activities that await now.

name: Sugarcane Empire
description: Plant Sugarcane! Employ Pandas! Conquer the World! Sugarcane Empire is story-based clicker game set in Chengdu, China and Kentucky, USA. Play as three generations of Chinese and American women. Experience how stories preserve us from death.

name: Blast Beat
description: Get your fist ready and defeat all the opponents in this VR action game! Immerse yourself in the fantasy world while throwing your fist to the beat. Release your stress and burn those calories through thrilling exercise!

name: Turk-A-Lurk
description: Turk-A-Lurk is a 2D Metroidvania precision platformer. Explore a large open world with 5 unique biomes. 100+ collectables to find. Multiple upgrades to unlock allowing new areas to be reached and easier movement. 20+ timed bonus levels to test your skills in. Full original soundtrack. Indie game.

name: Anthropocene Epoch
description: A dark atmospheric scifi First Person Shooter. Encounter characters including Jade An A.I implanted in your head, do missions to help others and get you off Earth before the Mantis destroy it.

name: The Soul Stone War 2
description: Overcome all obstacles by trusting in your own strength, the power of your Soul Stone, and your loyal companions. Become the legend you were born to be.

name: Space Demon Combat Tactics III
description: Join the High Commander as the eternally loyal Green in an epic journey to save the Blues from the menace of the Greys and their evil Red Gems!

name: SinsFromGod 2
description: SinsFromGod makes a return for a second part and it's now better than ever, SinsFromGod 2 introduces all new mechanics that were not in the original game like interacting with objects such as picking up items like notes, weapons, health items, and more. We have also added horrifying jumpscares to make sure you have nightmares for nights on end.

name: Sacrifice of The Spirit
description: A Brazilian hunter makes a terrible mistake of reaping the life of an animal on a full moon night, but Mother Nature will not let it go, the spirits of the forest punished him!

name: Rescue Party: Live!
description: Play alone or with your friends in this cooperative adventure for 1 to 4 players. Make the right moves, and coordinate with your team to rescue people in danger. Have fun, and act fast! The success of your team depends on your choices. Save as many lives as possible in a frantic race against time!

name: reIterate()
description: A modern-classic 2D precision-platformer

name: Battle Brothers: Lindwurm
description: Challenge your mercenary company against a fearsome Lindwurm, an adversary of legend, home to the wild parts of the world and fiercely defending its hoard of treasure.

name: Synthetic Lover
description: In the future a biot working as a companion and without free will, encounters a device that makes him feel human. Self-discovery, hardships, and romance may follow. A BL/Yaoi visual novel.

name: Interplanetary Gardener
description: Mow the lawn, survive harsh climates on alien planets, and use your credits to upgrade high-tech equipment. Become the best interplanetary gardener!

name: Word Crack
description: Simple word game!

name: Deemo II
description:
"When music plays, the sun shall stay."

A girl with flowers growing on her head and an incredible white being with a human form── Deemo. As a melody issues forth from the center of the train station, the rain gradually stops, and the sky clears up once again.

In the endless pouring rain, the two of them search the fantasy kingdom for a hope that will save the world.

name: Garden of the Sea
description: You wake up on a small island in a magical world. Grow your garden, nurture local creatures, furnish your home or adventure across the seas to explore more islands and gather new resources. This world is for you.

name: République: Deluxe Edition
description: République is a crowd funded stealth game released in episodic format, it consists of five episodes.

name: Sky And Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Wii Funkin'
description: Sin descripción

name: HornyWars
description: Help Turiel save her girlfriend from the clutches of the vicious demoness Lilith. On her way she and her friends will find themselves in various situations, some pleasant, some not so much...

name: Super Mario World: The Great Sixth
description: Sin descripción

name: Elysium's Curse
description:
This is my new wad, containing 6 maps. It uses Otex textures by @ukiro. It also features custom tree sprites (by @elend and @Negatronica) which really puts the icing on the cake as far as looks go. Also, that nice blue sky is by @Mechadon taken from "boxoskies-v3". MIDI's are by @AD_79, which I felt fit the theme very well.

Gameplay is mostly strategic with occasional mild slaughter elements. Maps are generally short, tough and fast-paced.

Difficulty-wise, I've tried my best to cater for most players... I wouldn't say UV is ultra hard but it can be rage-inducing without the right care. HMP is much more oriented for fun, although still challenging in parts. HNTR is a walk in the park.

Pistol starts are possible, but I personally think continuous play is a lot of fun for this wad!

name: Decay
description: A survival RPG that's about an hour long that's totally not influenced by current events. Go to work in the midst of a pandemic and a monster outbreak. Buy food and try not to starve. Hope you don't get sick or beaten to death on the way to work. Hope you don't lose it.

name: My Pig Princess
description:
An 18+ Visual Novel taking place in a kingdom where the pig girl Emelie is the princess!
You play as a human farmer in this lighthearted comedy adventure featuring plenty of adult content!​

name: FNaF World Randomizer
description:
This is a mod for FNAF WORLD where enemy encounters, bosses, party members, attack moves, chip chests, and byte shops are all randomized.

You have the option of either playing Adventure Mode- beginning with a team of 8 and going through the game as you would- or Fixed Party, which is having every move and party member from the start.

name: Squirdle
description: A Pokémon-themed guessing game where players aim to guess a mystery Pokémon based on its release generation, typing, height, and weight. Includes both a daily and unlimited mode.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DB DBmu748 080
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Space Stella: The Unknown Planet
description: Aliens invaded the planet that mankind was pioneering, and the exploration team went missing. The search team left to determine the cause, but their spaceship was attacked and only the main character survived. He fights a desperate battle to survive and find out the secret. Enjoy exciting TPS games using a variety of play modes and hot weapons that are released in level-up.

name: Turbo Shot
description: Turbo Shot combines a puzzle-filled top-down adventure with exciting gun-based combat that plays out in regular seasons of free-to-play single player and PvP content.

name: Flood
description: Try to get the whole grid to be the same colour within the given number of moves, by repeatedly flood-filling the top left corner in different colours.

name: Fencing Girl
description: This is a fencing competition game. According to the prompt of quick time event (QTE) on the screen, press the corresponding key to avoid the girl's attack and fight back. When you win the competition, you will get the favor of girls and interact with girls.

name: Quickerflak
description: Quickerflak is an experimental fast-paced time-attack top-down combat retro-hardcore minigame, that can be finished in a minute.

name: Missing Plane: Survival
description: You survived a plane crash, and now you will need to find a way to be rescued, for that you will be building an SOS signal and wait for a rescue. In the meantime you will need to eat, drink and build stuff to stay alive

name: My Soldiers
description: My Soldiers places you in the role of a soldier who's new to a post near the border, you are gonna meet three soldiers here. So "My Soldiers" tells a story that happens in this small post with these guys. These guys have different personalities, There are 3 routes and over 100 CGs in all.

name: P1441vr
description: P1441vr is a basic gun range simulator with semi realistic mechanics and a variety of game modes to sling lead in. Move n shoot your way through steel targets or disable enemy threats in Simunitions mode. *Read Early Access section*

name: Parrot
description: Parrot is a 2D ninja parkour game

name: Cataplexy
description: Waking up at night, the main character realizes that he cannot move. A terrible sense of panic gradually overtakes his mind, and the imagination begins to paint frightening pictures.

name: Mirrorama
description: A unique puzzle game with an interesting story. Witness the story of Josh Lattey while solving mind boggling puzzles using mirrors and reflections. Mirrorama offers an exceptional experience for puzzle game lovers.

name: Slums of Tetsoidea
description: Slums of Tetsoidea is an RPG about 4 women who need each others aid to save the world from a few evil plots. An interesting story about a corporation that desires collecting magical crystals, with a more sinister twist!

name: Hero Lodge
description: Hero Lodge is a fantasy tactical turn based strategy RPG with a focus on player knowledge. Learn enemy attack patterns to fight your way to redemption.

name: Over the Counter
description: A pharmaceutical business management game.

name: Nested Rooms
description: Nested rooms is a single player, first person experience taking place in a confusing non-euclidean world. Your goal is to navigate everyday life in a realm where rooms seem to coexist in the same space without interfering with one another.

name: Disaster
description: Disaster - You are going to take on the role of a bank robber in an ordinary city. This day did not bode well, but a terrible event happened.

name: Secret Mission: The Forgotten Island
description: Help Chanel explore the island, and make her way back to her ship in Secret Mission – The Forgotten Island, a fun and exciting Hidden Object game.

name: Forest Kingdom
description: Forest Kingdom Adventure Game Collect Resources which you can exchange with the villagers Weapon bases are upgraded to collect rare items. and upgrade equipment Resource Farming Tools Insert an engaging storyline and a variety of areas for adventurers to explore!

name: Spooky Shooter 3D
description: Spooky Shooter 3D - is a hardcore 3D shooter where you will survive in an old castle full of monsters.

name: Writer's Life
description: In "Writer's Life", the player will play a novel lover, open their career as a novel writer. The hardships of writing, the anxiety of shelving a new book will bring you a new and exciting experience.

name: SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters' Clash
description:
Characters from SNK and Capcom clash in this epic card fighting game!
Introducing! SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters' Clash, a white-hot card fighting game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color (released in 1999), is coming to Nintendo Switch!

Back then, SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters' Clash was sold as two separate games; the SNK Cardfighter's Version and the Capcom Cardfighter's Version. But now, both have been combined into one game! There's nothing stopping you from collecting all the cards!

name: Falling Kwadrats
description: A well-known puzzle, now for 2 players! One plays the game, while the other picks blocks for him.

name: Engine Evolution 2021
description: Engine Evolution is a multiplayer racing game that uses similar principles as World of Tanks - with each PvP race, against 11 other players, you gain experience and credits, for which you can buy various upgrades for your motorbike, or unlock the next motorbike.

name: DeadPoly
description: DeadPoly is a polygon zombie survival looter shooter with base building and crafting. Your only goal is survival, everything else is optional.

name: Journey: The Heart of Gaia
description: One evening a stranger appears at Liz's doorway, whisking her away to a colorful world that lies deep within the center of the Earth. Not only is it controlled by a powerful tyrant, but the very heart of Underworld is dying! Can Liz save this world and find the way back to her own? Journey through a fantastic landscape filled with quirky characters. Rescue the captured citizens, and they will help you put an end to the tyranny of Scartaris Umbra! Dive deep into the world of Journey: The Heart of Gaia, a thrilling puzzle adventure!

name: Brawl Stars: Year Of The Tiger
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Pocket Dating
description: Sin descripción

name: Lunaris
description: Sin descripción

name: Two of Us
description: Two of Us is two-player multi-puzzle game!! This game's goal is to finalize missile (puzzle) by collecting parts in spaceship, and to shoot alien's battleship.Let's finalize the puzzle efficiently by calling out each other to adjust timing and active communication!!

name: Rich Girls
description: "Rich Girls" is a casual board game / strategy game based on cards, dice and land properties. Players play the role of a gentleman, encountering various business ladies, and fighting against each others in the world of business war.

name: Aerial Rave
description: Ever wonder what Devil May Cry would be like if the entire game was in the air? Climb as high as you can while making sure to be stylish! Rack up kills and altitude while avoiding falling to your death!

name: The Incomplete Lunar: First Night
description: This is a visual novel game with the theme of furry characters and same-sex love. You will play a human character who is about to become a furry man in the game, break into a small town in southwest China by mistake, and get involved in the local wonderful past.

name: Police Girls on the Case!
description:
Policing may run in your blood, but that heritage only makes the badge feel heavier. When an explosion rocks a park outside the station, this could be the chance to finally prove your worth.

With a reputation for being a rogues gallery, Unit 304 is about to be tested with the arrival of a new commanding officer. And when a mysterious stranger also offers to help, it soon becomes clear that you will have to hold everything together to stand any chance of solving the crime.

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Ryan Martin Bundle
description: The Ryan Martin Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All features new vehicles and parts from Ryan Martin’s garage. The DLC includes his all-new car, 10 body kits, three sets of rims, and three new paint bundles. Expand your customization options for your favorite Street Outlaws racer!

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Steel Thunder Bundle
description: The Steel Thunder Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds an exclusive battle-hardened paint job, new rims, body kits, the Chameleon Forest paint bundle, and a yellow parachute. Intimidate the competition with this intense add-on.

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Blazing Freedom Bundle
description: The Blazing Freedom Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds an exclusive patriotic paint job, new rims, body kits, red, white, and blue paint bundle options, and the Fast Turbos parachute. It’s the perfect bundle for celebrating the Fourth of July.

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - The 70s Bundle
description: The 70s Car Bundle adds 70s-inspired car content to Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All! The DLC includes 14 new body kits, four new sets of rims, and a new parachute. An additional three paint bundles will let you fly your favorite nostalgic colors.

name: Cube Dodge
description: Test your dodging skills with various toys in a shower of bombs and surrounded by traps in a relaxing, contemplative and fun game that aims to inspire players with ancient wisdom.

name: League of Pantheons
description: Guess who will win the fight among Zeus, Odin, Wukong and Susanoo? Ancient immortals from Greek, Norse, Japanese, Egyptian and other mythologies, are gathered in this League of Pantheons. Will you be the Summoner to bring back their mighty power?

name: Rainbow Story Global
description: Start a relaxing adventure across a gorgeous open world with friends and fellows, cute pets, and mounts!

name: Clash of Beasts
description: A beast fantasy world calls. Ancient lore, titanic beasts, and strange elements, all worth a fortune. You are a mercenary carrying the Beastmaster's spark in your blood. Will you master the tactic of beast warfare and defend your base from the villain and bring peace to the world?

name: Destructor Tanks
description: Outplay your rivals by speeding, drifting, shooting and blocking them with environmental hazards as you fight your way to first place. Play against your friends in intense four-player online multiplayer matches and aim for the top of the leaderboard.

name: DweeMixed: Thwee Pack
description: Upon entering this dimension many years ago, magicdweedoo has proven to be relentless in his development and delivery of otherworldly multimedia experiences. dweeMIXED: Thwee Pack, a collection of remastered underground indie gaming staples, provides an essential guide to this labyrinthine mind.

name: Catch them!
description: Catch them is the simplest and exciting game that will help develop your attentiveness. You have to play as a hen catching different fruit and avoid uneatable food.

name: My Nemesis and Hero
description: Join Kai in his daily life as he fails to realize the two guys, who he knew since childhood, have a huge crush on him. One is his best friend, and the other is his rival. So they can't possibly have romantic feelings for him... right?

name: Maverta Island
description: Maverta Island - minimalist, relaxing, motion logic, mind game. The player's goal is to survive the labyrinth and save the mates.

name: Shiori no Kotoha: Dark Reflections
description: A series of murders and bizarre incidents occur in a private library that has become inescapable. Eventually, the food runs out and the library becomes filled with madness... This work is a visual novel of the survival suspense genre, set in a private library.

name: Santa Jump
description: Santa Jump is a 2D side-scrolling arcade platformer about Santa giving out gifts to all the kids for the holiday. For a larger area of coverage, he needs to climb higher and higher, jumping on platforms.

name: ImpossiBubble
description: Face off against an endless stream of bubbles. Keep them from reaching the top by adding, subtracting, dividing or multiplying the numbers inside. And you need to match the target number before the timer runs out. Fail to do either and you’ll lose health. Lose enough health and it’s game over.

name: V696
description: V696 is a first-person horror-thriller game. It contains a cult subject of veiled beings. Even if everything seems clear at first glance, it has a gripping story that will throw you a curve.

name: Eagle Simulator
description: If you've ever wondered what it's like to be a bird, then Eagle Simulator is just for you!

name: Coma: Lost in the Maze
description: Find out the story of the main character and get out of the sinister nightmare.

name: Brain Bait
description: Arcade, Puzzles, Speedrunning: Old school one-screen puzzle action game. Lure all Zombies into the traps to advance to the next level. Includes Steam Leaderboards and Personal Challenges.

name: Mini Golf Worlds VR
description: Golf through immersive worlds ranging from the depths of the sea to the far reaches of outer space. Customize your appearance, and show off your golfing skills online with up to 8 people.

name: Fruit Salad Theory
description: It's the night of the big ball, and things are going...well...they're going. When so many people of so many different species are gathered together in one place, you're sure to have an interesting time. But what if something a little more malicious is happening under the surface?

name: Runewaker
description: A solo dev, first person magic slinging souls-like with an emphasis on combat and exploration.

name: Mot De Pass
description: The main character pursues the Antagonist, but he manages to open a portal and enter the world. The world can be different: whether it be a fantasy city with magic or a post-apocalypse

name: Curses of Tarot
description: Curses of Tarot is a single-player poker and Tarot themed deckbuilding card game with a variety of play modes, mini-games and challenges. Swap cards to create poker hands, plan your matches to clear each board, fortify your deck with glorious boons, break any curses inflicted upon you, and test your fate in a variety of special events!

name: Pilapa Boom
description: Pilapa Boom is an extremely lightweight mini game. Players can shoot bullets to detonate the bombs and trigger a chain of explosions to open the path to the end. There is almost no learning cost, and you can play it right away.

name: Ruins of Mitriom
description: Explore the continent in search of Mitriom, ancient energy crystals to power the various improvements of your caravan (Skills, Bonus, Cannon on the caravan etc). Dynamically manage your resources to adapt your skills according to the situation.

name: Sfare: Relax your mind
description: Relax and enjoy what your mind creates. Take your time.

name: Far Cry 6: Control
description: For the first time in Far Cry history, you are the villain. Get up close and personal as you take control of the legends themselves: Vaas Montenegro, Pagan Min and Joseph Seed – all played by the original cast. Across three DLC episodes, you will delve into these iconic villain’s twisted minds, uncover their backstories, battle their inner demons, and reunite with familiar faces. All of this in a new Far Cry gameplay experience in which you will have to die… and retry. Can you escape the mind of a villain?

name: The story of Bill Bear
description: Help the little bear to find the way home. What dangers can be hidden in the night streets of a quiet suburb? Who is waiting for him at home, and who is waiting in the dark around the corner?

name: My Life As An Archeologist
description: Click your way through 100 levels of archeological treasure hunting, loot and improve your equipment, uncover build-defining artefacts on every boss, choose between three different classes and find the one that best fits your playstyle! Research monsters cards and improve every run!

name: Liber
description: We all dreamed of adventures full of mysteries and mysticism, dreamed of finding ourselves in unusual situations and emerging from them as a hero. Solve riddles, fight enemies, fight adversity and help the main character Alex unravel the hidden meanings of Liber.

name: Heck Deck
description: Heck Deck is a bullet hell card game where all the bullets are cards and time only progresses as you move. Explore 5 stages full of unique enemies and bosses, discover dozens of cards, and visit shops to buy and sell cards for health!

name: Black One Blood Brothers
description: Black One Blood Brothers is a tactical military shooter game where strategy and coordination are key. Command a squad of top operators, with unique skills, through high-risk missions around the globe. Customize your crew, plan your missions, and adjust on the fly for a vast replayability.

name: Neko Ghost, Jump!
description: Neko Ghost, Jump! is a puzzle-platformer where you not only switch between 2D & 3D camera perspectives but also between your physical & ghost forms to solve puzzles, combat enemies, and clear levels faster.

name: Homegrown Pet
description:
Your pet has unfortunately turned back into shape of tiny cute blob.
You need to feed him fast in span of 60 second before the authorities arrived!
Easy control! And with 21 different endings to get!
How will you raise your pet in span of 60 second?

name: Absurdle
description: Absurdle is a word guessing game where players must identify a target word which is chosen from the largest existing subset of possible words, based on the already existing information from previous guesses.

name: Letterle
description: Letterle is a guessing game where players must try to guess a mystery letter from the English alphabet. Players can share their scores to compare who was able to guess the mystery letter earliest.

name: Pizzeria of Peril
description: Pizzeria of Peril is a limit removing map with only 99 monsters - 11 secrets - and yummy doomcute pizza! Are you up to the task of saving the pizzeria from hoards of demons?

name: Sushi Food Cart
description:
From today, you are the owner of this sushi restaurant!
As various customers come to the restaurant, make and serve sushi according to their orders.

There is more to it than just making sushi.
You have to prepare the fish, so go to the ocean and catch them.

name: Frantic Fall
description: Frantic Fall! is a physics-based puzzler that is a unique blend of careful planning and hilarious fails. Your objective is simple: Rotate the world to land the orb in the cup.

name: Tales of Grimm
description: Players collect and battle dark-fantasy versions of fairytale characters to save a magical world from corruptive dark magic.

name: No Leg Lenny
description: Lenny has only one dream, he wants to go on the moon. Problem is, Lenny has no leg... But this will not prevent him from becoming a living legend. And to do so, Lenny needs the help of two things : a rifle, and a skillful player to guide him.

name: Trial of Empires TD
description: Trial of Empires TD, is a Free to Play 3D tower defense game. Pick your ally and build your army to defend your lane against powerful enemies. Compete with other players on Leaderboards.

name: Magical Deathpair
description: 16 Witches, 8 Couples, Game to escape death... Hunt down the Imposter. Save the world from impending catastrophe. Life and death adventure game for those who love charming witches.

name: Day on Mars
description: An adventure awaits you on Mars where you need to save a team of sexy girls from an unknown disease. Making them... sexually active.

name: Word of the Law: Death Mask - Collector's Edition
description: Investigate serial crimes and city government secrets! You're the only one who can get on the trail and break the chain of murders. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Sakura Alien
description: Haru is a university student with a passion for the stars. He was content enough to observe space from afar, through a telescope - until a strange girl who claims to be an alien crash lands into him, and claims him for her husband!

name: Exotic
description: "Exotic" is a fantasy adventure game. Players need to hunt in the endless wilderness, search for various resources to develop weapons, eliminate mutants, and find a way home.

name: Cramit's Keep
description: Cramit's Keep, is a top down, roguelike, where you navigate through various dungeon levels. Customize Cramits abilities with potions and powers, and ultimately defeat the evil within the Keep.

name: Bimous
description: In Bimous, you are in a region with different biomes and enemy species such as yetis, goblins and wizards. Explore the map, discover new buildings, fight enemies and destroy whatever you want.

name: Hisui no Kikai
description: This is a fun addicting casual game. The plot is presented from the perspective of a guy from an archaeological expedition. In addition to visual scenes with various characters, the player will have to solve simple but interesting puzzles. Passing the level, the player receives a reward!

name: Another Sight
description: A stealth action game where you rotate the camera" your way through 2D dot-art x 3D stages.The goal is to reach the "Tomb of the Grandparents", one last time……This is the story of a grandfather's secret and sad wish that was entrusted to his grandson, a young girl.

name: VR Async Balls
description: It's a simulator of a slot machine. Swipe two balls simultaneously on different moving tracks. Do not try to push two balls at the same time moving your hands asynchronous, not everyone can do it. Check if you can do it! 20 levels in the game, each of them is more difficult than the previous one.

name: Farmer Adventure
description: The story of a farmer from whom an ancient dragon stole a sheep. And now you need to do everything to get it back. Embark on an incredible adventure, visit an ancient castle and appear on the doorstep to its ruler.

name: Operation S
description: Puzzle strategy game,where the player has to rotate the rings to save astronauts

name: Carrier Commander
description: Advance from Commander to Fleet Admiral while in charge of the USS Nimitz (CVN-68) - a supercarrier of the United States Navy, and the lead ship of her class. Manage your Carrier's Assets and Resources to defend yourself from enemy engagements and advance your Naval Career. 15 Levels of challenge!

name: World War 2: Strategy Simulator
description: Tactics & Collocations 30+ Historical Campaigns: Normandy Landing, Operation Market Garden 2 Warfare Conflict Camps: Allies faction and ally Axis 30+ large battlefield maps are provide in this strategy games Omni-directional combat space: naval battle, air combat, land battle.

name: Azar
description: Azar is a top view shoot'em up where you and your friends must rebel against the violence of the police and the lies of the mainstream media! Get prizes in robberies and damage to property! Have fun in various different scenarios full of shooting action, hard bosses to defeat and a lot of glass to break!

name: Asteroides
description: it's simple, fast, rocking, without pauses, without life, without time will you save the earth? Asteroides is a 70/80s shooter with realistic physics and a completely three-dimensional environment. Moving, destroying and surviving is complicated in an infinitely finite space.

name: Elif
description: Elif is a 3rd person puzzle-platformer. You will experience a wholesome narration following the main character Elif. You will have to face challenges and succeed in all trials. But you won't be alone: your favorite friend and companion Crocus will be there to help you!

name: Bouncy Goat Climb
description: Bouncy Goat Climb is a highly punishing 3D precision platformer about a goat bouncing up a beautiful mountain to save its scared baby goat. Can you handle the challenge and endure all obstacles that you will face on your way up the mountain?

name: Roads of Rome: Portals - Collector's Edition
description: By some quirk of fate, a group of brave Romans found themselves in mysterious worlds. Help them find their way back home. Build settlements, clear paths, defeat enemies. All for the glory of Rome! Open portals and caches - help the heroes survive!

name: The Vision of the Ant
description: A monster-catching, dungeon-crawling RPG. Delve into mysterious dungeons, capture and train a diverse roster of unique monsters, and unleash them in intense, strategic turn-based battles. Level up your team, discover hidden secrets, and unlock powerful abilities.

name: Leading the Dead
description: A lot of zombies are inducted in Leading the Dead. You can try thrilling experience never before. Revenge the stupid people by destroying the barricade that is the only weak point in the wall.

developers.name: Owls (国際情報工科自動車大学校)

name: Search All: Christmas
description: Search All: Christmas is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the Christmas candy in the form of a cane (caramel cane) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling".

name: Defend from Candyland!
description: Step into the world of Defend from Candyland! where retro tower defense meets strategic depth. Plant and upgrade trees, use powerful buffs, and reveal enemy paths to shield Eden from waves of candy invaders. Master the challenge now!

name: Graveyard Spells
description: Graveyard Spells is a fast FPS inspired by 90's games, and combines elements of classic retro-shooter with low poly style. Graveyard Spells is an experience from beyond the grave.

name: TD Worlds
description: TD Worlds is a dynamic, highly strategical game that challenges your skill. Build an impenetrable defense and get ready to plunge into a new, unknown world to uncover its secrets.

name: Racingmaybe
description: A drag racing game with a complex upgrading system where driving faster than the speed of light is possible. Which is fast. Real. Fast. Even your rusty car can race this fast, if you're good. But first, see if you can break the soundbarrier

name: Let's Cook
description: Do you want to manage the restaurant together with your friends? You can try the restaurant simulation with your friends online or locally. You can enter with a maximum of 16 people. You can play alone if you want (it will be difficult.).

name: Nutty
description: Sin descripción

name: Sailor Moon RevengeX
description:
Queen Metalia is planning to control planet Earth, and Sailor Moon must prevent it to save all forms of life, accompany Serena in this amazing battle.

Detailed and musicalized in the Sailor Moon cartoon, a video game that every true anime and PS2 fans can't help but enjoy.

name: Fortress Interior
description: Large classic-style mountain base map. Map source is included.

name: Streets of Rage 2X
description: Remake of the famous Beat 'Em Up series. The remaster features improved artificial intelligence, high resolution and frame rate, new abilities, the ability to block, aerial combo attacks, and much more. Of the innovations, the developers note a cooperative mode for up to 4 people.

name: Experiment: Groceries
description: You go to the local supermarket every day, but you notice that something changes. You should figure out the truth about this place.

name: Potty Quest
description: You play as an enby mage kid in search of a bathroom in the spooky basement of a community college while making friends with the local monsters and collecting magic rocks along the way.

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 4C
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Cat Tavern
description:
Welcome to Happy Cat Tavern!

Batou wants to drink as many milkshakes as he can while the tavern patrons cheer him on. Each word is one milkshake for Batou to drink - Type quickly and accurately to gain points and unlock achievements!

name: Poker Tower Defense
description:
Defend the kingdom and earn spectacular rewards!
Deploy cards and Heroes with various abilities!
Merge and upgrade your cards to fend off enemies!
Use powerful Hero Skills to escape dangerous situations!
See what you can do with the cards you've been dealt!

name: Inkfish
description: Inkfish is a physics game in which you need to draw lines to protect a falling object from dangers. This object is a cute squid.

name: Donut Be Seen
description: Help our alien kitten reach area 51, and do not be seen.

name: Help me please
description: You can't negotiate with zombies, you can't bribe or promise something in return, they will slowly but surely follow you wherever you go to destroy you. It's impossible to hide from zombies, they always sense where you're hiding. The only way to escape is to destroy them first.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Blasting Adventure
description: This game is a remake of Sonic 3D Blast 5, Sonic Adventure 7 and Sonic Adventure 8, Game Boy/Game Boy Color bootleg games by Makon Soft/Yong Yong.

name: Scary Bosses and Nice Sprites
description: Sin descripción

name: Mimic
description: A short puzzle game where you mimic animals to take their form.

name: Mage Guild
description:
The player starts in their wizard tower where they can change the appearance of their mage, select their spells from their spellbook, then head out to duel other mages and learn their spells.

Customize your wizard's appearance.
