Choose spells from your spellbook for effects like fireball, the ability to summon magical creatures, create a wall of electricity, teleport, push and pull your foes, protect yourself with a magical shield, and more.

Learn new spells after dueling groups of other wizards.

Mix up your spells between duels to try new strategies.

name: Doomed: Demons of the Nether
description: An ambitious Minecraft adventure map based on the recent DOOM games by id Software.

name: Giselle
description:
"I tend to sit alone... and talk to myself, and in the emptiness of my room... I hear my thoughts."

Giselle is a short, creepy puzzle RPG maker game, where you play as a young girl, trying to leave her room without getting consumed by her own thoughts.

name: Super Metroid: Cryogenesis
description:
Suspicious Space Pirate activity has been detected by the Galactic Federation in the remote Tog'Tassano system and Samus is sent to check it out. Discover the truth of what's going on and power yourself up in this frigid, hostile environment.

Super Metroid: Cryogenesis is a romhack created for a streaming contest. This is the contest version with cleanup fixes from what was seen when it was streamed. More is planned and being worked on to expand, however that doesn't mean this should feel half complete. A compact adventure awaits you with a focus on clean, thematic visuals and unique level design.

name: Spheriko
description: Spheriko is an arcade game for mobile.

name: Drifty Pool
description:
Pool and Drifting?
Yep.
Drift around a pool table and sink balls!!

name: Bound by Love
description: When Yokoshima finds out his office crush, Hazuki Ichinose, is transferring overseas, he realizes that he needs to act and finally ask her out.

name: Mafia: Family's Secret
description: Mafia: Family's Secret is a top-down shooting game. Kill your enemies, go through all the missions and discover the secrets of Guidice mafia family.

name: Laser Bounce
description: Move and rotate pieces to get the laser to hit the goal. Colored lasers, gates, and activators add additional challenge to this relatively simple concept. Can you complete all of the levels?

name: Indirection
description: Indirection is a unique puzzle platforming adventure where you can only move in one direction.

name: The Shore VR
description:
The Shore VR is a first-person story-driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. You will play the role of a man who ends up on a mysterious island. Strong elements of Lovecraftian horror, struggle to survive in an unknown world.
Presented with a Lovecraftian style, As players dive deeper and deeper into the mystery, they'll face overwhelming odds. It's only by mastering the artifacts of the old gods combat mechanic that they can stay one step ahead of the darkness that tries to swallow the world of his, but will that be enough?

name: Gedaria
description: Action 2D adventure game Solve puzzles using your legendary rake Rake leaves, form piles or destroy leaf-barrier Blow leaves away with wind or leaf blower, escape quicksand leaves, build your path with leaves and save the family

name: A Cure for Jessica
description: An emotional story-driven game, where you play as Dr. Olivia, a scientist trying to find a way to cure her daughter. Explore the world and save Jessica from this deadly virus, as you recall some memories.

name: PaintBall War 2
description: Paintball War 2 is the sequel to the most ambitious sports simulation game based on sports discipline in real life called paintball!

name: Beast Crimes
description: An unexpected crime investigation drama.

name: Soulvars
description: Get ready to ignite your Soul! Soulvars is a pixel art, turn-based deckbuilding RPG inspired by classic JRPGs with a modern twist. Unravel a dark conspiracy as your party of Soulbearers faces off against invading Dominators in dynamic, action-packed battles.

name: Passengers of Execution
description: Witness the journey of an officer in the homicide department from ordinary and invariably quiet life to an unknown world. Passengers of Execution is an independent game whose main theme is adventure/puzzle, although it contains many mechanics.

name: Crossybara
description: Small-Leaf the Capybara lost the fruit he was going to bring to the hot spring to stack ontop of his head! can you help him scavenge for the lost fruit and save the day? Crossybara: Nonogram Slam! is a new take on the regular Nonogram/Picross puzzle, Instead of solving the puzzle to reveal a picture, you are solving to reveal the level. loads of enjoyable platforming gameplay with a side dish of brain-bamboozling puzzles!

name: Jigsaw Novel: Sexy Job Interview
description: Jane's job interview turns into an unexpected sex experience, due to a wrong choice of outfit. Solve all 12 jigsaw puzzles to find out what naughty things Jane has done at her job interview.

name: Do Robots Dream of Ice Cream?
description: Bobby the robot's AI has progressed more than his creator, Robert, knows. With his newfound curiosity to experience new things, Bobby decides he wants to try ice cream and see what the big deal is!

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Spider-Man - Volume II
description:
Fight against the one and only Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man in the new FNF mod "Vs. Spider-Man".

But that's not all, fight against a guy who leaks your IP address (Mysterio).

A symbiote who's fallen from space and took captive of an innocent human (Venom).

Now with v2, fight along with Spider-man to defeat his greatest enemies such as Doctor Otto Octavious, A man who fell into a pool of eels! (Electro) and last but not least, the man Spider-man hates the most.. the one and only Norman Osborn aka Green Goblin.

name: Dark Lord's Maze
description:
DARK LORD'S MAZE is a 3D dungeon crawler made in 8-bit style.

Jump right into this colorful, pixelated world full of traps, enemies and different environmental hazards and enjoy a true classic gaming experience, fueled by the sounds of Commodore 64's SID and a fair amount of difficulty!

name: Dine Together
description:
A Relax & Chill restaurant City P2E game. ~
The game is just a simple cook & serve gameplay.
You can also buy fram to gain the ingredients to cook the food too.

Now it incluede both Decroration & Cooking PVP ~

name: Requiem of Science
description: Requiem Of Science is a free Sci-Fi modification for Half-Life 2: Episode 2. Gameplay similar to the gameplay of Half-Life 2, but with some changes. These changes are not about the overall balance of the game, but about unusual narrative.

name: To a Starling
description: To a Starling is an indie fantasy platformer. Use your teleportation abilities to whirl through the rocky wastes and to find brighter stars.

name: The Grave robber
description: The grave robber is a role play / action adventure / puzzle solving game, which tells the story of the treasure hunt for Cao Cao.

name: Marshmallow All the Way Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Sports Car Driver
description: What better way to explore a beautiful coastal city than from behind the wheel of a luxury sports car?

name: Saviour of Humanity
description: "Saviour of Humanity" is a classic 2D side-scrolling platformer about a tough soldier.

name: Bus Simulator Pro
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead End Aegis
description: Extraterrestrial invaders have come to take over Earth, and only an elite force of "magical girls" that have been infused with alien superpowers can stop them.

name: Basketball Baby
description: A boy with a strong body can always win the favor of girls, and a boy who loves basketball can always capture the hearts of girls. It feels so good to play ball with the babies!

name: Succubus War
description: It has been four years since the succubus and human beings started war. As the strongest remaining mankind, you have embarked on the road to crusade against the succubus alone.....

name: Love Accident
description: Friendships begin and end. Everyone has their plans.

name: Blazend
description: Blaze through 7 action packed levels in this sci-fi shoot 'em up made to test even the toughest of shmup veterans. No tricks and no gimmicks; all you have is your raw skill. Board the Phoenix G7, and blast those alien lifeforms to interstellar space!

name: Meow Express
description: You are a cat on a robot vacuum cleaner. Which means you are bus driver in the cat world! Dodge obstacles, pop innocent kids' baloons, dash through buildings to collect your fellow cat pussengers. Meow Express is a cute, fun and annoying casual arcade game, just like our furry friends.

name: Rock Star Manager
description: Manage your own music studio, hire bands, schedule shows and pay your bills.

name: Haunted Hotel: Silent Waters - Collector's Edition
description: You won't enjoy your stay...
COLLECT MEMBERS!ENFORCE YOUR MEMBER!MAKE YOUR OWN RAIDER!

name: Towns Battleground
description: Towns Battleground Is a new war strategy game, the game players need to pass the reasonable placement of arms to fight, is a test of the ability of platoon arrangement!

name: The Living Handra
description: Explotre the empty Russian streets, filled with depressive athmosphere. Find all the interesting places. Feel the sharm of an lately abandoned post-soviet town. Walk through all the streets and avenues you can find.

name: Camp Wars
description: First-person shooter, science fantasy. Slime Weapons. No deaths.

name: Refraction: Beyond the Mirror
description: Refraction is a first-person survival horror game about escaping The Mansion that has trapped you inside itself. The Creature is out on the hunt. Explore the house, find the Runes and the Altar, hide away from the Creature, and use the Mirrors to learn all of the secrets of the house to escape it!

name: Letreco
description: A word guessing game. Every day a new word to guess.

name: Tales of Raetrethra: Legends of the Past - Chapter 1
description:
'Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past' is the story of an amnesiac man who awakens in an unfamiliar world. Follow his adventures in discovering this rich and mysterious new world, the diverse people he meets, his efforts to remember the past, and his struggles to save the future.
Chapter 1 continues the journey of our nameless protagonist under the care of Etse and her granddaughters, Nali and Rulie. It also follows Niyue as she struggles to fulfill her duties in an unfamiliar land.

name: Intense Love Shot
description: In a world invaded by succubus, only you can save everyone by using your unique power to make all of her nightmares (or dreams) come true!

name: Tales of Raetrethra: Legends of the Past
description: 'Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past' is the story of an amnesiac man who awakens in an unfamiliar world. Follow his adventures in discovering this rich and mysterious new world, the diverse people he meets, his efforts to remember the past, and his struggles to save the future.

name: Rising of the Moon
description: Join the strange misadventures of Robert, the stoic warrior, Ben, the buff, aggressive but friendly sailor, and Lorien, the hot-headed mage girl with reckless behaviour and acute pyromania.

name: No Haste
description: No Haste is a survival horror game. Sneak into a shopping mall to steal, be discreet and smart and don't get caught by the Rist creature! Multiplayer is coming soon!

name: Truffle: Classic
description: Truffle is a minimalist maze puzzle game where touching the walls kills you instantly. Test your patience and dexterity in 10 handcrafted levels.

name: Cupid Story: First Date
description: Cupid Story is a small RPG / dating sim in the Cupid Island universe. The cupid Noelia has a mission: get the human Daniel a girlfriend in 14 days. Too bad he's got no talent at all to make her job easier.

name: Simulatte: Coffee Shop Simulator
description: This game is a free to play reality coffee shop Simulator. where you can eat, take pictures or walk around a coffee shop. You can use your cell phone or just hang out in a realistic 3D coffee shop

name: My Story
description: A short, narrative-driven, precision platformer about the most toxic community on Earth: Human Social Interaction

name: CubeHook VR
description: CubeHook Go try matching numeral cubes into each other without losing and unlock all maps in the most enjoyable and addictive puzzle VR game CubeHook.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Norway
description: Puzzles about Norway!

name: Fear of the Dark
description: Fear of the Dark is a first person survival horror full of mystery. The actions are taking place in an abandoned dark kindergarten where there’s no one except for you… and someone else’s chilly presence. Explore the building and find the exit, but try not to catch the evil’s eye.

name: Shadow Watcher
description: This game is a RPG action type game with female protagonists. Use all kinds of active and passive skills: assassination, back stabbing, rebound, counterattack, pursuit, combo, and active skills to show their skills in the face of a variety of enemies in bloody confrontation.

name: Virus at Home
description: Set in the distant future of 2024, Virus At Home lets you save the world by defending your home. Exterminate the giant virus that is terrorizing humanity. Become a national hero in this fast-paced FPS adventure.

name: GunRunner
description: GunRunner is a free endless runner arcade game for PC and mobile. Assume multiple shapes and move forwards in a cube dilemma. Proceed through levels and grow your cube count. Join the developement and let us know what you would like to see added to the game.

name: UAL: Universal AIM League
description: UAL is a FPS game. You can engage in either 1V1, play with or against a friend, or 2V2 duel. UAL relies on e-sport mechanics with Best of 5 Set system (1 Set is a best of 3 games) and mini game for each round.

name: Ghost Exile
description: Ghost Exile - is a cooperative horror from 1 to 4 players: when hunting for ghosts, you need to determine the type of ghost, carry out a ritual of exorcism and then the ghost can no longer harm anyone. Be careful! Hasty conclusions can lead you to a sad outcome.

name: Netherspace 2
description: A shoot'em'up game for up to 4 players that combines advanced RPG advancement elements with pure space shooter action, 20 unlockable weapons & 4 heroes with varied strengths in their 10 primary stats, along with each ship's 10 aspects, add a huge variety of choices for all gamers.

name: Assassin at Crimson Keep
description: Assassin at Crimson Keep is a short visual novel set in a dark, quasi-fantasy world. After a botched assassination attempt, you pursue the King into his lair known as the Crimson Keep. Your small choices can have great consequences, either for good or for evil.

name: Mercs Fully Loaded
description: Mercs Fully Loaded is a TPS (Third Person Shooter) RPG. Start your career at Mercs-HQ as their newest recruit, help citizens of Mercs-HQ rebuild the city, play mini-games or hunt for collectibles in your spare time.

name: Office No. 41
description: Experience an adventure horror gameplay. Solve puzzles, find secretes and don't get catched by the creatures of this abandoned place. Be ready to hide wherever you can. The puzzles you must solve can be very different. In some moments, be very attentive and use your brain.

name: Emote Farming Simulator
description: Farm emotes, play scuffed games and react to video! See in-game simulated chatroom react to what you say and your gameplay. Say specific trigger words to make the in-game simulated chatroom react.

name: MiniRacer
description: Choose your little car and race!

name: Outerverse
description:
Build automated machines and weapons across the universe to beat massive bosses and advance your technology while experiencing cosmic events in this quest driven automation crafting adventure game.
Includes a manual scenario for crafting instead of machines for those not a fan of logic/automation!

name: Internet Cafe Simulator 2
description: Internet Cafe Simulator 2 is an extremely comprehensive and detailed internet cafe business simulation game.

name: Car Parking Simulator VR
description: Car Parking Simulator is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive car parking experience. The game has one of the best vehicle physics simulations in VR.

name: King 'n Knight
description: King ’n Knight is an arcade platform game that takes place in a medival fantasy world. Play solo or coop in this game inspired by Ghosts’n Goblins and Megaman.

name: Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand
description: Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand is a game about an operation for rescuing a princess kidnapped by monsters in a fantasy desert kingdom. The hero (user) must solve numerous puzzles and deal with countless monsters to complete the operation. It combines adventure puzzles with RPG elements.

name: Nurose
description: Build your own custom spells in Nurose. Challenge others to online duels where you will fight using your own custom made spells. You can create shields, mines, clones, movement abilities, and much more.

name: Eminus
description: Eminus is a new Tactical FPS based on realism. Plan your next move carefully because there is no more room for mistakes. You need to finish the job.

name: Everyday Life Edengrall
description: A relaxing farming simulation with deep mechanics, explore the town of Edengrall and befriend the villagers!

name: FIshing Adventure VR
description: Fishing Adventure VR is a typical fishing game, where the player can (drums) catch different fish species! Fish in USA, Hawaii and other unique fisheries.

name: Space Turret Gunner
description: 《SpaceTurretGuner》is a VR shooting game, as a gunner of the space battleship, players will experience many battles we carefully prepared for you。

name: Heaven Dust Collection
description: The product is a collection of HeavenDust and HeavenDust 2.

name: Train Lovers
description:
Two lovers sitting in a train trying to fix their relationship before the ride ends. Can you help them and reach the best of the 3 outcomes?

Global Game Jam 2022 Entry

name: Atolladero
description: A single map with enough detail to make things interesting, along with different combat situations, from long range to close quarters.

name: Moto Rush GT: Full Garage
description: Sin descripción

name: Circadian Cycle Deepest Sleep
description: Circadian Cycle Deepest Sleep is a low-poly 3d horror indie game. You wake up in an infinite corridor and try to figure out what is on the paintings.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Eurobeat Pack Vol.2
description: The Touhou Eurobeat Pack was so popular last time, we've released a Volume 2! Enjoy a collection of Euro remixes that hold their own against Vol. 1!

name: Demon Gaze Extra: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: A deluxe edition of Demon Gaze Extra with tons of bonus DLCs!

name: Plant Down
description: Play as a plant in its instinctive quest to take down the monarchy.

name: Cyber Hook: Lost Numbers
description: Lost Numbers it's a new content for Cyber Hook with 30+ new levels, new mechanics, new soundtracks in a brand new environment. Learn to master time, space and gravity to collect the crystals to save the world of Cyber Hook from corruption.

name: Pinball Jam
description: Enjoy 12 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Pac-Man
description: Super Pac-Man is an action game released by Namco in 1982. It’s an additional power-up to Namco's flagship title, Pac-Man! Eat Super Power Pellets to become invincible and get a speed boost! Eat a Power Pellet after that and become Super Pac-Man to take out all the ghosts at once!

name: Jigsaw Master Kids
description: Jigsaw puzzle for kids in "Jigsaw Masterpieces" series !

name: Dual Souls: The Last Bearer
description: The spirit of old-school fighting games is back with Dual Souls. Inspired by classic fighting game series, Dual Souls delivers it all - it’s fast; it’s full-on; it’s tactical; it’s online and it’s fun! With fluid animations and colorful graphics, Dual Souls is a highly tactical game with multiple unique fighters, each with their own fighting styles and moves.

name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Forbidden Crypt - Collector's Edition
description: When an old friend requests Mia’s help restoring an old cathedral, she packs her bags for the seaside town of Porto Nacosti, Italy! But she soon finds trouble in paradise - a crypt below the church holds a long-lost secret that a powerful family is desperate to keep. Search through visually dazzling hidden-object scenes, restore art pieces in need of love, and reveal what history forgot in Faircroft's Antiques: The Forbidden Crypt!

name: Theatre of Sorrows
description: In Theatre of Sorrows you will join Killian and Eileen in a deadly journey through Esha and dive into dark secrets of its inhabitants; try to navigate your way through the unknown territory with only a handful of hints that might lead you to a dangerous discovery about things that should have probably been consigned to oblivion...

name: Alone Musc
description: Join the world of classical and modern music and discover your talents. Don't miss the tiles and start playing music. The game has 4 different difficulty modes and each difficulty mode has different music. You need to challenge yourself to unlock the difficulty modes. Don't forget that you can earn more points by making combos! Come on! Start the challenge and play music right now!

name: I Love Finding Cats!: Collector's Edition
description: I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game with a great selection of mini-games. Visit beautiful locations from across the globe while you find and collect adorable feline friends! This Collector's Edition also includes Christmas Bonus levels.

name: Looking Glass
description: A ram finds himself trapped in a room with no memories. How will he get out?

name: Dead Cells: Road to the Sea
description: This bundle contains the base game and all of the DLCs that have been released for Dead Cells so far: Rise of the Giant, The Bad Seed, Fatal Falls & The Queen and the Sea. So you will get 8 new levels and 5 new bosses with all their associated enemies, weapons & outfits on top of the original Dead Cells.

name: Being a DIK: Season 2
description: Being a DIK is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life. The second season is a continuation of the story, and it's packed to the brim with even more content than the highly acclaimed first season had to offer.

name: Electrician Simulator: First Shock
description: Learn the ropes from your Dad to become an electrician. Repair and assemble sockets, panels, strips, plugs, chandeliers and even change light bulbs. Oh... and don't mix up the wires! Results might be shocking.

name: Idling Idol
description:
Raise up idols by idling! Idols have random names, appearances, stats, and personalities. Choose the one and only idol and raise it to become a top idol!

A score-attack type simulation game where you train idols whose appearance and ability are randomly generated!

name: Robot Chariot Battle
description: In this endless battle arena, should you choose to survive as long as possible under the fierce attack of the opponent? Or choose to fight back and destroy the opponent.

name: Samurai war era Hunter
description: "Samurai war era Hunter" is a mini-game in the process of making a simulation game during the Warring States period in Japan.

name: Box Logistics
description: This game has a super simple goal - just put all boxes to their places. But you can move only one box!

name: Tamed: Chapter 1
description: Platform game inspired by Little Nemo Dreammaster. Tame creatures and use their ablilities to navigate through each map.

name: Abduction
description: Abduction is a singleplayer psychological horror experience. When unexpected visitors arrive in the middle of the night, you must defend your farm in order to take back your land.

name: Owlone in the Woods
description: Help an owl find its chicks after losing them - and the ability to fly - in a thunderstorm. In this short 2D platformer you slowly recover your ability to navigate the dangers of the forest as you bring your chicks back to your hollow one by one.

name: Meteor Volleyball!
description: Meteor Volleyball! is a simple, fun, comic-like volleyball game that simulates your life if there were a meteor heading towards Earth and you have to survive by piloting a volleyball robot. Protect your home and survive!

name: Many Buttons to Press
description: This video game is living proof of how hard it is to make video games.

name: You Will (Not) Remain
description: You must stay in your apartment as the city around you falls to an Eldritch horror.

name: Love, Death & Veggies
description: Six stories about the most important things. And elves, gnomes, robots, aliens, adventure, and love.

name: Avian
description: Avian is an adventure game based around a musical instrument that allows you to interact with the dense vegetation of a subterranean world. Play as a guardian of a long lost civilization submerged by an ancient evil, and find your way through this infested world to help cleanse it of all evil.

name: PinballAdventure
description: This is a leisure and happy adventure game. You need to control the pinball through your own micro operation to complete the adventure of the level in the fastest and most perfect time. When you fail or succeed, we will have a description prompt. Please don't mind. That's our encouragement to you!

name: Calm Down, Will
description: Explore most haunted places everyone is sick of, the looping hallway and the abandoned hospital. Play Timmy to discover the boring truth. But when Angry Will goes there, the dark secret will be revealed. Of curse, Will is neither a family killer nor an investigative journalist.

name: Fears to Fathom: Norwood Hitchhike
description: Holly Gardner, a 19 year old on an interstate drive experiences unusual happenings that leads to an unplanned stay at a motel, little did she know what was transpiring down in Norwood Valley.

name: Zombies Killer Machine
description: With only some run-down cars at your disposal, your mission soon becomes clear. Drive through hordes of zombies in order to escape alive!

name: Dream Fruit Farm
description: Tom and Charlize very love fruits and want to build their own dream fruit farm. Will we help them in this fun Match3 game?

name: Shiba Army
description: Try to survive with your character on an imaginary path to the moon. Collect as many coins as possible, play to get the highest score, so that you can be your own captain in the Shiba Inu army.

name: American Christmas
description: American Christmas is a Mario-Megaman-Sonic inspired 2D platformer. This game aims to recapture that magic feeling you’d get when gaming during a time in the 90's when 2D platformers reigned king in the gaming industry.

name: Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea
description: Dead Cells: The Queen & the Sea will conclude the DLC trilogy that began with The Bad Seed in 2020 and continued with Fatal Falls in 2021. The new expansion will introduce two new biomes, called "The Infested Shipwreck" and "The Lighthouse"), new weapons, and of course a magnificent boss, which once you will be allowed to finish an alternate ending.

name: Hexagourds
description:
Hexagourds is a casual, relaxing builder and puzzle game where you place tiles on a grid to make your own pumpkin patch! Grow pumpkins, feed animals, and pick apples as you gain points for rotating, placing and connecting different tiles.

If you're in love with the fall season or are in need of a relaxing game to distract you from the stressful day-to-day activities of life, then Hexagourds is definitely for you. This game has no winning or losing. You play at your own pace, gaining points for placing tiles wherever you want. You place some pumpkins here, some goats there, and haybales everywhere. This game was meant to be played on a chill, autumn Sunday morning with a coffee next to you. I hope you try it out and enjoy the game.

For those more strategically inclined, there is definitely some strategy involved with maximizing points. I've added dailies and a mutliplayer scoreboard if you want to show the rest of the community your sweet score in Hexagourds. But that's all up to you.

name: Soldier Warfare
description: Action shooter game with tactical combat and realistic gameplay experence.

name: Midnight Legends
description: Hop in and participate in frantic combat racing on the mean streets of Midnight City, a place lit by bright neon lights. Earn money and reputation, upgrade your car, win to challenge all “legendary racers” of the city, and make your way to becoming a Midnight Legend.

name: Beautiful Mystic Defenders
description: Beautiful Mystic Defenders is a tactical tower defense, romantic visual novel game where you are the savior of the mystic realm's incredibly gorgeous ladies. Build towers wisely, level up heroines, obtain upgrades, defeat hordes of monsters and immerse in a stimulating harem love story!

name: Cipher 61
description: Cipher 61 is a fast-paced, action-packed top-down-shooter, with tons of temporary and permanent upgrades. Can you make it through all 61 rooms?

name: Re:Kuroi
description: Follow the bullied boy Kaito along in this adventure RPG as he battles various magical creatures.

name: Crowalt: Traces of the Lost Colony
description: A young adventurer Hugh Radcliff is in pursuit of one of the greatest mysteries of history: The Lost Colony. Deal with pirates, dive into native rituals, reveal conspiracies, and make tough choices on your difficult journey for unveiling this mystery!

name: Exquisite Amethyst
description:
Here is a new single map for GZDoom, inspired an inordinate amount by Cyb's "Void".

Ambition outgrew the time allotted before Fuzzball's birthday, so it was released 2 weeks late.

name: Genshin Impact: Fleeting Colors in Flight
description:
Version 2.4 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Shenhe and Yun Jin
• New area: Enkanomiya
• New main story quest: Interlude Chapter, Act I - "The Crane Returns on the Wind"
• New hangout events for Ningguang and Yun Jin
• New main event: Fleeting Colors in Flight
• …and more!

name: The Secret Elevator: Remastered
description:
Take the role of a human being trapped inside his dream. Memories and nightmares mingled in this place. You have to open the small door to find way out.
The Secret Elevator Remastered is an atmospheric adventure with horror elements.
Immerse yourself in the history of the game, discover many endings and unravel the main secret.

name: Doghouse 2
description:
You find yourself in your backyard yet again with the same goal: constructing the perfect doghouse. But this time, things get even crazier than they were last time.
This game has five endings in total.

name: Pokémon Theta Emerald Renev
description: Pokémon Theta Emerald Renev is a remake of the difficulty/enhancement rom hack Pokémon Theta Emerald EX, expanding its selection of obtainable Pokémon and adding a number of quality of life changes.

name: The Arcade Tower
description: Climb aboard The Arcade Tower and overcome its floors by adopting the codes of this place, as mysterious as it is thrilling. Death will be your main enemy in the floors, and thinking will be your best asset. Use magic stones to challenge logic and fight fearless enemies in the many levels of The Arcade Tower.

name: Let's Go! Baby! Friends World
description:
"Let's Go! Baby!" is a mysterious netgame from 2001 where people could get together and hang out in a virtual world inhabited by babies. The game mysteriously disappeared off the market after many complaints, but has since resurfaced in hobbyist circles as a "so bad it's good" gem.

Today, we at Feverdream Softworks have decided to revive this classic game, now with various enhancements.

It's time to meet your maker... Or should I say, your Daddy?

name: Mimelet
description: Travel with Mimelet through a wonderful adventure! Jump on top of enemies to steal their powers and overcome any obstacles along the way. Mimelet is a wholesome platform adventure game featuring a simple and fun game mechanic and challenging puzzles.

name: Bad Faith
description: Sanctuaries. Secrets. Serious consequences. A solo-developed psychological horror/drama visual novel.

name: Termo
description: "Termo" is the Brazilian version of the browser game "Wordle", where your objective is to guess a 5 letter term within 6 tries. With each attempt, the color of each letter will tell you how close you are to the answer.

name: Blossom: La Jirafa Saga
description: Enjoy the journey in this fun platform and Runner game thus begins her escape to Freedom. Help Blossom to escape the Zoo in part 1 and get the Ship to help her complete her journey in part 2.

name: Bridge to Another World: Christmas Flight - Collector's Edition
description: The fate of Christmasland depends on you!

name: Heradonia
description: Despair seizes a mother's heart when she finds her daughter gone.

name: Slette Mette
description: Slette Mette has many challenges as a prime minister, she has to avoid journalist, delete text, remove minks, jump over striking nurses and much more.It is the number 1 casual Game in Denmark on both Android and IOS. Now coming to you on Steam! How long can you last?

name: Argonauts Agency: Glove of Midas
description: The Argonauts Agency – Experiments with a magical glove lead to a hilarious blunder!

name: Letters From the Moon
description: In this sci-fi pick your own story game, you must help astronaut Dorothy Chen survive in a vast underground alien city beneath the moon's surface. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to you.

name: Daraku Gear
description: Sin descripción

name: Slaughter Cannon
description: Slaughter Cannon is an addictive physics puzzle game with exciting and challenging levels of varying difficulty.

name: Down the Hill
description: Down the Hill is an arcade scoring game. Move down the hill along the cells avoiding holes and trees.

name: Wrong train
description: What if you got on the wrong train that you were waiting for and fell asleep, and woke up to find that there are no people around anywhere else, and the train itself is endless? Will you be able to return home?

name: Bomb Voyage
description: Battle up to 4 of your friends in this local play brawler to become the ultimate bomb testing robot. It's an explosive game of keep away!

name: Clockwise Jinx
description: A puzzle with unusual motion mechanics.

name: Tkium Exclusion Area
description: Tkium Exclusion Area is an horror escape game. You need to get out of this place, and quickly. Even if this area looks abandoned, nothing can confirm that you are really alone. You have to leave quickly, the fear is taking over you.

name: Big Booty Adventures
description: Glory awaits! Hoard your treasures and battle enemies as you move through a physically challenging world. Learn to wield a variety of weapons and strategize your assault to obtain loads of booty. Explore the world to find hidden treasures to customize your playstyle and enhance your abilities.

name: Idle Superpowers
description: Idle Superpowers is a roguelike idle rpg where you are a superhero who can get multiple superpowers that are combinable and synergize with each other! - Many superpowers to unlock - procedural generation - combine and synergize superpowers - challenges which require different playstyles

name: An Outcry
description: A branching-path narrative horror RPG set in Vienna, Austria. Guide the Unnamed through the worst night of their life: Harass your neighbours. Debate with birds. Smoke to survive.

name: Heaven Dust 2
description: Deep inside a research base, waking up from a cryogenic pod, you find yourself trapped in a living hell, surrounded by zombies. Heaven Dust 2 is a love letter to classic survival horror games featuring exploration, action, puzzles, and resource management.

name: Ryahs Rhythm
description: Ryah's Rhythm: Relaxing Games invites you into a world where your creativity is the key to relaxation and enjoyment. Design and personalize your ultimate retreat, from dream homes and lush gardens to intricate greenhouses and whimsical treehouses. Embrace the serene ambiance enhanced by cozy vibes and a tailored selection of relaxing soundtracks.

name: Little Fox: Bubble Spinner
description: Sin descripción

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Shinra Pack
description:
A mod that adds 2 leaders, alongside the Shinra civilization. President Shinra as a leader grants you massive discounts to upgrading units, while Rufus gives you bonuses to wall protection and siege units production. The civilization bonus are as follows:

- Unique building (Mako Reactor)
- Unique unit (1st Class Soldier)
- Unique agenda (Industrialist)
- And much more!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Nekomata Okayu
description: Face off against Nekomata Okayu, a chill catgirl streamer hailing from Hololive, in her original song "Mogu Mogu Yummy." With little onigiri prisoners and cool sunglasses and a cute pastel aesthetic, this short and simple mod is perfect for all of us fans of Vtubers out there!

name: Five Nights At Jerpig's
description: A Five Nights at Freddy's fangame featuring 3 guinea pigs and one hedgehog ( Note: not Sonic the Hedgehog. ). Complete with a custom night and star system.

name: Clean It All
description: Sin descripción

name: Q-Cubed
description: Q-Cubed is a spatial-reasoning puzzle platformer. Navigate a 3D world while seeing and moving in two orthogonal perspectives.

name: Retrogram
description:
Think you're a word nerd? Make as many words as you can using seven letters
Retrogram is a love letter to the 1970s, and the most stylish word puzzle you'll play all year. Train your brain and discover new words every day
Subscribe to get the Daily Puzzle. A new puzzle each day, hand-curated and full of interesting stories about your favorite words.

name: Star Discord
description: Battle other player in this Competitive RTS simplified for mobile. Build large bases and produce big army. Use your skills to control your army to battle against other player. Only 1 player will be victorious. test your wit and strategy and defeat your opponent using strategy and skills.

name: Super Vadimka II: Revenge of Dr. Kulik
description: Super Vadimka II: Revenge of Dr. Kulik is a free horror platformer developed by VadimBallzGames for Windows. This sequel to Super Vadimka marks the continuation of the thrilling Super Vadimka series, bringing back the ingenious designer who crafted numerous levels filled with formidable bosses and devious traps. In this installment, players face the sinister Dr. Kulik, who aims to conquer the world once more. Prepare for a harrowing adventure as you traverse dangerous landscapes, battling monstrous foes and navigating treacherous hazards.

name: Army to Army
description: Army To Army is a strategy game with physics and mountains of non-disappearing victims. In the game, you can collide with each other from 2 to 4 armies, in total on the map there can be more than 500 fighting different classes and characteristics.

name: Secrets of the Dragon Cafe
description:
As a humble shamisen player, you’ve been walking to a beat that nobody seems to appreciate, but a chance encounter on the streets of Akihabara might be just the thing you need to change your tune. With three beguiling coworkers by your side it isn’t just a question of which one is your type, but whether you’re even the same species…

At the ‘Burning Love’ maid café, fun and excitement are on the menu, and drama is the dish of the day!

name: Cards Infinity
description: Play Cards Infinity, an endless card game with zero ads and purchases.

name: Galactic Dreams
description: Humanity is racing through space on the wings of hope, away from the emerging threat of a cosmic cataclysm that could spell extinction. And mysterious aliens with powers beyond imagining follow them everywhere they go.

name: Timings
description: Jump from platform to platform in this minimalist puzzle platformer. All platforms except your starting platform move at different speeds, some even carry the coveted token.

name: Royal Legends: Marshes Curse - Collector's Edition
description: The people of Libertyville are in danger! Evil and witchcraft are gaining strength to carry out an insidious plan to take over the city. Help the authorities stop the Swamp Witch and save innocent people!

name: Alice!
description: Alice chased the rabbit. Then, she fell. she fell from top to bottom. Slam! The noise echoed. Shoot, my butt. It must be the destiny of 「Alices」 to suffer. But still, shouldn’t she watch out for herself to avoid going through such incidence in the 21st century?

name: F-Rank Hero Story
description: This beautiful fantasy world will never be friendly to you. Games mimic many aspects of real life. You are a insignificant F mercenary in a world where magic and monsters exist.

name: Maze of Bears
description: World-wrapping, block-sliding, bear-avoiding, non-euclidean, cat-collecting puzzle, with crazy number of power-ups and block interactions.

name: Pixel Robot Return
description: Pixel robot is coming back. Destroy enormous robot boss and collect treasures

name: Superstar Streetz
description: Superstar Streetz is a multiplayer action-packed racing game. Race to success in 2 minute races, and outcompete your opponents with a range of destructive and fancy weapons across different race tracks.

name: Theory of Poltaran
description: Theory of Poltaran is an action - adventure game where players can explore the surroundings of locations, participate in battles with creatures from laboratories, as well as fully immerse themselves in a fantastic plot.

name: Nomifactory
description: Nomifactory (ファクトリーのみ) is a quest-driven expert pack focused on building large-scale factories, where you will put your automation skills to the test as you progress from punching trees to creative-in-survival, climbing the power tiers of GregTech: Community Edition (GTCE) and its extension, Shadows of Greg. No complicated magic systems, no forced combat or exploration: Only Factories!

name: My Magic Florist: Deluxe Edition
description:
My Magic Florist will take you to a world of magic, colors, and harmony. You'll be tasked to take care of your own enchanted flower shop. Earn money and make upgrades through wise investments!

Your magical fairy powers are a good start, but you'll need to get experience and hone your skills to truly succeed. You're the only boss, and in the end, it'll be up to you and your hard work. Can you make it?

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIII: Wonder-ful Builder
description: Help Hercules build Colossus of Rhodes, Lighthouse of Alexandria and other Wonders of the World despite all the obstacles!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DR DBmtrue 215
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: GirlHub
description: Experience everything. It's more thrilling than the first experience.

name: Deliricard
description:
It is a collectible card game. It is a game with simple mechanics, in fact all the cards have 1 to 3 keywords to describe their skills. The game consists of resetting the life points of the opposing characters (Heroes) to earn VPs (Victory Points) with each kill.
Within the game there are different types of cards, permanent and temporary.
The game is all written in HTML, PHP and JavaScript so it can work on any type of browser.

name: Chess: Clash of Kings
description: Our app is ideal for everyone. It contains 10 different levels of difficulty, over 400 challenges and a diverse set of boards and pawns to make the game even more enjoyable.

name: Trigger Dungeon
description: Rage inducing trap-filled precision platformer ideal for speedrunners and masochists alike. Navigate through nearly 200 hundred rooms filled with devious tricks and traps. Classic, easy to pick-up gameplay with colourful pixel art graphics.

name: Geography Quiz Festival: Guess the Countries
description: Advance through our beloved game by completing the different missions you find on your way. Prove that you know the most about Geography!

name: Biker Garage: Mechanic Simulator
description: Biker Garage: Mechanic Simulator allows you to be a top motorcycle mechanic. Your main aim is to be the best mechanic you can, with loads of really happy clients. You start your adventure in a small home workshop which you will need to grow to become the best motorcycle mechanic in the world. Test your bikes on a track, check the quality of your repairs and improve bike performance with fine-tuning. Not only do you customize motorcycles at the request of customers, but you can also create your own dream machine. Find a bike at the junkyard or buy it from a shop and change it beyond recognition while choosing from hundreds of different parts. When you expand your business (and your garage), you will unlock new features like the auction system, racing, and further skills for more difficult tasks.
